markdownRemark.html: I never thought about it until I started planning, but Hawaii Island is nicknamed “Big Island” for a reason. It’s the largest island. Discounting that a lot of the land you’re not going to visit unless you’re into backpacking trips, I split most of my time in three regions.

frontmatter.title: Thoughts on Defense of the Dark Arts
